# Original single line equations

\begin{equation}
Y_{i j}=\mu_{i}+\nu_{j}+\epsilon_{i j}
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
Y_{i j}=\beta_{0 i}+\sum_{h=1}^{8} \beta_{1 h} X_{h}+\nu_{j}+\epsilon_{i j}
\end{equation}

\begin{equation}
Y_{i j}=\beta_{0 i}+\sum_{h=1}^{8} \beta_{1 h} X_{h}+v_{j}+\varepsilon_{i j}
\end{equation}

# Multi-line versions

\begin{align*}
Y_{i j} & \sim Norm(\mu_{i j}, \epsilon) \\
\mu_{i j} & = \beta_{0 i}+\nu_{j}\tag{4} \\
\nu_{j} & \sim Norm(0, \sigma_{\nu})
\end{align*}
